titleStmt.title: A vindication of every free-man libertie against all arbitrary power and government, or, A letter of William Larner, prisoner, to Sir Henry Vane, Junior, a parliamentarian wherein is set forth his unjust imprisonment and cruell hard dealings towards the said William Larner.
titleStmt.author: Larner, William.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with print show-through and slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
